resources.string: Let Tendy scan your surrounding to find interesting people around you. Browse by age, profession, hobbies and more
Decide what information your profile will show at any given time. With Tendy, your profile can be as dynamic as you
The people you meet with Tendy can become your long-time companions. Chat together from everywhere, at any time.
You already have a user with us, and it\'s not connected through facebook. try connecting with your phone number.
Can\'t have a profile without a nick name
Can\'t have a profile without a name and a birthday date
We couldn\'t save the image right now.. try again later
You\'ve successfully signed in! Create/edit your first public profile. Your public profile is how other Tendy users see you.
i like life and life likes me
You want be able to discover other people if you don\'t turn on your Bluetooth
There was a problem with your registration, the username might be taken.
Your device doesn\'t seem to support Bluetooth. You can\'t use Tendy without it.
A password must be at least 6 characters long
An email has been sent to you
login has failed! check your email and password and try again. If you\'ve already signed up with Facebook, login again with Facebook
No such email exists in our records
Would you like to chat with %1$s?
You\'re not connected to the internet. You can\'t proceed without an internet connection
there is already a standing chat invitation between you and %1$s
You\'ve successfully signed in with Facebook! if you haven\'t already, create your first public profile
%1$s minutes left. ask to stay in touch.
You\'re about to block %1$s. You won\'t be able to return to this chat. sure you want to continue?
A request to stay in touch
You\'re about to send a \'stay in touch\' request to %1$s. If both of you request to stay in touch with each other, the timer will stop and you can chat forever. send a request?
You\'re about to delete this chat. sure you want to continue?
We\'d like to send you notifications when you\'re near other Tendy users. We\'d like you to allow us access to notification policy.
Your time for staying in touch is over. This chat will be deleted.
We can\'t go on without this permission
You can\'t do that until the invitation has been accepted.
has asked to stay in touch
Sure you want to log out?
You have to fill the \'name\' field
You didn\'t save a real profile (in the side menu)
fill in your public profile before you go the the chats and discovery screens.
We\'re having a temporary issue with doing what you\'ve asked.. try again later.
%1$s minutes left. approve stay in touch request.
This message was deleted by you
You can\'t share you real profile before you write you\'re first message to your chat buddy
You can\'t block someone before you\'ve invited them..
The chat has been blocked by one of the sides.. we\'ll now move out of the chat screen
This is not a valid phone number
Didn\'t get a code? ask again in %1$s seconds..
click on this button to get a verification code
You can only get a code once every 60 seconds..
A code has been sent to your number via SMS. enter that code in the below textbox
Once you share your real details you can\'t go back, this chat partner will always see your real profile. sure you want to share it?
You can\'t go on without saving your real profile. we will not show this information to anyone unless you specifically instruct us to.
Get​ ​Started​ ​in​ ​seconds. What are you waiting for? Sign up now and start meeting interesting people around you.
Tendy will send an SMS message to verify your phone number. Enter your 10 digit phone number:
You can\'t edit some of this data anymore. if you feel like you have to, contact our support (side menu).

You've turned discovery off.
Click here to turn discovery on.

When your discovery is turned off you can't be seen and you also can't see other people with Tendy.

Tendy users who already discovered you can still send you messages.
The code you\'ve entered is not the code sent to you. try again.
There was a problem with phone verification for this number. try again.
Welcome to Tendy! this is your real profile details page. the details you write here will NOT be shown unless you decide to share them.
There was an issue with loading the image.. try again
You can\'t send more messages until your invitation have been accepted
has just sent you an image!

Tendy keeps discovering other Tendy users when the app is closed. Tendy keep it\'s battery usage to a minimum, you can count on it. to close this service, just click on the \'Discovery state\' option in the side menu of Tendy.
